title: Installation issue: py-pillow-simd
body:
py-pillow-simd does not build on powerpc64le due to -msse4 flag being incorrectly applied.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install py-pillow-simd
...
     19    /home/agaspar/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -Wno-unused-result -Wsign-comp
           are -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -fPIC -fPIC -DHAVE_LIBJPEG -DHAVE_LIBZ
            -DPILLOW_VERSION="7.0.0.post3" -I/home/agaspar/spack/opt/spack/linux-rh
           el7-power9le/gcc-7.4.0/python-3.8.5-bvt4tu23blr4jgq45j5gxnkmgzhjhumr/inc
           lude/python3.8 -I/home/agaspar/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power9le/gcc-
           7.4.0/zlib-1.2.11-fkwiwuhquvi2cpy3xjyre6fvxz36cbiw/include -I/home/agasp
           ar/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power9le/gcc-7.4.0/libjpeg-turbo-2.0.4-yh
           hvmbonzgpnp3buiyesk4go4yipqhlm/include -I/ram/tmp/agaspar/spack-stage/sp
           ack-stage-py-pillow-simd-7.0.0.post3-ocscvbije5ae7uimc2dqeet3gmgokw42/sp
           ack-src/src/libImaging -I/ram/tmp/agaspar/spack-stage/spack-stage-py-pil
           low-simd-7.0.0.post3-ocscvbije5ae7uimc2dqeet3gmgokw42/spack-src -I/home/
           agaspar/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power9le/gcc-7.4.0/python-3.8.5-bvt4
           tu23blr4jgq45j5gxnkmgzhjhumr/include -I/usr/local/include -I/usr/include
            -I/home/agaspar/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power9le/gcc-7.4.0/python-3
           .8.5-bvt4tu23blr4jgq45j5gxnkmgzhjhumr/include/python3.8 -c src/_imaging.
           c -o build/temp.linux-ppc64le-3.8/src/_imaging.o -msse4
  >> 20    gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-msse4'; did you mean '-mi
           sel'?
...
```

### Information on your system

```console
* **Spack:** 0.15.4-1452-0d75636a3
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-power9le
```
